official_title: To establish a Presidential Commission on Insurance.
short_title: Presidential Commission on Insurance Act of 1991

summary.text: Presidential Commission on Insurance Act of 1991 - Establishes the Presidential Commission on Insurance to study and report to the President and the Congress about specified aspects of the insurance industry. Terminates the Commission after submission of its report. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Presidential Commission on Insurance Act of 1991
